marklogic.body: Why is anyone surprised at this latest shambles.Â Everything this baby leader touches is a mess not helped by shambling libdems and ministers encouraging people to indulge in dangerous Acts. I was waiting for the first accident to be reported and, sure enough, a woman has been badly Burned dealing with petrol in cans. Pensioners unhappy, pasty eaters unhappy, motorists unhappy. Oh when oh when will we get a vote of no confidence and have a proper election?
